title.narrative: F.a: Campaign for Protection of Environment and Livelihood Resources of the Coastal Community in Tamil Nadu

description.narrative: The project will have 3 components which are conjugating and focusing at one point: ?Protection of Coastal Eco System? is the long term goal of the project. The project is aimed at forming sound resource centre that share knowledge, that assists local grou ps in taking their struggle forward and lobbying to raise the issues to the general socio political domains. Project activities and immediate objectives: Documenting the impacts of thermal power stations and chemical complexes and disseminating the same to the coastal community so that resistance to more anthropological intervention in the coast is amplified, To achieve increased environment activism and to develop a set of young and vigorous activists demanding policy change in favour of protection of coas tal eco system, To educate students about the natural vegetation of coasts and to create/ strengthen existing coastal natural vegetations (mangroves and sand dunes), To mobilise support of in land people in favour of coastal issues and make them aware of i mportance of water bodies of Tamilnadu and in particular to coast environment, To debate on the present paradigm of coastal development and to demand for people centric policies for coastal development, To develop TNEC into a capable resource centre by ade quate documentations and publications in the print, visual and electronic media including web based publications so that a well orchestrated campaign on coastal eco system is possible, To provide support to the struggling environment victims by interlinkin g legal and sciences and providing other assistance so that they are placed at better position in their bitter struggle. CEDA was founded by Mr. L.Antonysamy in the year 1992, later TNEC came into existence. Purpose of CEDA:Creating an integrated vision ab out the Environment, Analyzing the Environmental issues, Handling the Environmental issues through CBOs, Lobbying and Advocacy on Environmental issues, Networking for exchange information, experience.
